intro: In the world of point and click adventure games, Unholy Adventure: Mystery will offer you a distinctive experience of story-rich adventure with a hint of surrealism.
description:
If you like point and click adventure puzzle mystery games and narrative games with story mode - you've come to the right place.

Unholy Adventure: Mystery is a point and click adventure game with hundreds of storyline puzzles.

Each of our adventure point and click narrative story games is packed with mystery and secret stories.

STORY:
Point-and-click adventure games 2020 had a lot to offer, but Unholy Adventure: Mystery will charm you with its story. We love choice-based narrative games, and in Unholy Adventure: Mystery, we had put focus on creating classic point and click adventure with a dark riddle of the gloomy neighborhood.
If you like mystery stories, meet Peter Grim, the main character of Unholy Adventure: Mystery – story based point and click adventure game.

Who kidnapped Peter’s wife? What is this strange storm about? Why did giant rats take over the city? You will discover these secrets in our free story mode adventure game.

Embark on a dangerous adventure full of secret stories and puzzles, to save Peter's wife, in a surreal world full of retro atmosphere and unforgettable characters. Trust us – this story based point and click adventure will be remembered for a long time. It’s not just another hidden objects game for free or some creepypasta games.

KEY FEATURES: 
- point and click gameplay with puzzles
- storyline full of hidden objects 
- story rich narrative 
- mysterious, gloomy atmosphere
